spell_tooltip.description:
A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 16% and all magic damage you take by an additional 6%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Your auto-attacks generate 50% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 131,880 damage and healing you for 20% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 53,366 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards and resetting the remaining cooldown on Taunt.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 63,362 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec. Also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning for 2 sec.
Revenge has a 20% chance to immediately refund 50% of the Rage spent.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.0% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.

Blasts all enemies within 8 yards for 154,228 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Generates 5 Rage.

If you have Rend, Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
Raise your shield, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 25% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 66,632 damage and stunning all enemies within 16 yards for 2 sec.
Shield Slam deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Shockwave's range increased by 6 yards and when it strikes at least 3 targets its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Revenge deals 25% increased damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
If Whirlwind or Thunder Clap or Revenge hits 3 or more enemies it hits them 1 additional time for 30% damage.
While wielding one-handed weapons your damage is increased by 12% and Leech increased by 8%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 8% of your Armor.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.

Throw a spear at the target location, dealing 568,476 Physical damage instantly and an additional 1 million damage over 6 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Enemies hit are chained to the spear's location for the duration.

Generates 20 Rage.
Avatar increases the damage of Thunder Clap and Shockwave by 50% and reduces the cooldown of Thunder Clap by 50%.
Champion's Spear's damage increased by 50% and its Rage generation is increased by 100%.
The duration of Champion's Spear is increased by 2 sec. You deal 25% increased critical strike damage to targets chained to your Spear.

Fight through the pain, ignoring 50% of damage taken until 1.5 million damage has been prevented.

Repeated uses of Ignore Pain accumulate, up to 4.7 million total damage prevented.

Swing in a wide arc, dealing 225,663 Physical damage to all enemies in front of you. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Your successful dodges and parries have a chance to make your next Revenge cost no Rage.

Demoralizes all enemies within 15 yards, reducing the damage they deal to you by 25% for 8 sec.

Generates 20 Rage.
Your auto-attacks deal an additional 107,234 Physical damage and have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Increases maximum health by 30% for 15 sec and instantly heals you for that amount.
Defensive Stance additionally reduces magic damage you take by 6%.
Devastate, Thunder Clap, Revenge, and Execute have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Using Shield Slam increases the damage of Shield Slam by 10% and the block value of your shield by 5% for 16 sec. Stacking up to 3 times.
Taunts all enemies within 10 yds to attack you for 6 sec.

Devastate deals 20% increased damage and generates 2 Rage.

Devastator deals 10% increased damage and generates 2 Rage.

Wounds the target, causing 88,293 Physical damage instantly and an additional 218,754 Bleed damage over 15 sec.

Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
10% of damage you deal adds to your active Ignore Pain.

Increases the radius of Demoralizing Shout by 5 yards.

Each enemy hit by Thunder Clap reduces the remaining cooldown on Demoralizing Shout by 1.5 sec, up to 4.5 sec.
Reduces all damage you take by 40% for 8 sec.
You are able to block spells for 30 sec.
Shield Slam generates 2 more Rage and extends the duration of Shield Block by 1.0 sec.
Shield Block lasts 2 sec longer.
Every 10 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Avatar and Shield Wall by 1 sec.
Shield Wall gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 60 sec.
Shield Slam deals 10% increased damage and reduces enemies' damage against you by 3% for 9 sec. Multiple punishments may overlap.
Increases Strength and Armor by 5% and your critical strike chance by 1%.
Increases Block chance by 24% and your Block value by 48%.
Increases Stamina and Armor by 8% and your Haste by 2%.

Charge to an enemy with your shield, dealing 1.1 million Physical damage to it and 359,819 Physical damage to all enemies within 10 yards.

Also stuns the primary target for 4 sec.

Generates 20 Rage.
Demoralizing Shout also generates 20 Rage and increases damage you deal to affected targets by 20%.
Your maximum health is increased by 6% and every 20 Rage you spend heals you for 1% of your maximum health.
Every 250 rage you spend triggers a Violent Outburst, causing your next Shield Slam or Thunder Clap to deal 200% increased damage, generate 50% more Rage and grant Ignore Pain.

Throws a whirling weapon at the target location that chases nearby enemies, inflicting 1.3 million Physical damage to all enemies over 9.0 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 10 Rage each time it deals damage.
Shield Charge deals 20% increased damage, grants you Shield Block, and makes your next Revenge cost no Rage.

Damaging enemies with Thunder Clap, Revenge, or Execute has a 25% chance to also strike one with a lightning bolt, dealing 242,996 Nature damage and generating 3 Rage.

Lightning Strikes occur 30% more often during Avatar.

Stormstrike or Nature damage your abilities deal is increased by 5%. Stormstrike damage ignores Armor.

Thunder Clap damage increased by 40%. 

Seismic Reverberations now affects Thunder Clap in addition to Whirlwind.
Lightning Strikes also deal 69,276 to enemies near their target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Shield Slam damage increased by 15%.

Demoralizing Shout reduces damage enemies deal to you by an additional 5%.

Shield Slam and Bloodthirst have a 35% chance to grant you Thunder Blast, stacking up to 2 charges.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals 40% increased damage as Stormstrike and generates 8 Rage.
Storm Bolt also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning them for 2 sec, but its cooldown is increased by 10 sec.

talent.name: Keep Your Feet on the Ground

spell.name: Keep Your Feet on the Ground

spell_tooltip.description:
Physical damage taken reduced by 2%.

Thunder Blast reduces damage you take by 8% for 5 sec.
Thunder Blast calls down a Lightning Strike on an enemy it hits.

Lightning Strikes generate 3 Rage.

Revenge and Execute damage increased by 25%.
Lightning Strikes have a 15% chance to make your next 2 Shield Slams have no cooldown.

Casting Avatar grants you 2 charges of Thunder Blast and resets the cooldown of Thunder Clap.

While Avatar is not active, Lightning Strikes have a 10% chance to grant you Avatar for 6 secs.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals Stormstrike damage.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 16% and all magic damage you take by an additional 6%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Your auto-attacks generate 50% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 132,101 damage and healing you for 20% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 52,672 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards and resetting the remaining cooldown on Taunt.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 63,887 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec. Also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning for 2 sec.
Revenge has a 20% chance to immediately refund 50% of the Rage spent.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Blasts all enemies within 8 yards for 154,361 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Generates 5 Rage.

If you have Rend, Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
Raise your shield, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 25% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 67,426 damage and stunning all enemies within 16 yards for 2 sec.
Cooldown of Shield Wall, Pummel, Intervene, Spell Reflection, and Storm Bolt reduced by 5%.
Shield Slam deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Shockwave's range increased by 6 yards and when it strikes at least 3 targets its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Revenge deals 25% increased damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
If Whirlwind or Thunder Clap or Revenge hits 3 or more enemies it hits them 1 additional time for 30% damage.
While wielding one-handed weapons your damage is increased by 12% and Leech increased by 8%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 8% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 384,305 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 521,125 physical damage over 8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.
Thunderous Roar's cooldown reduced by 45 sec.
Increases the duration of Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect by 2.0 sec and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from all your bleeds.
Activating Avatar or Shield Wall grants 4 sec of the other.

Fight through the pain, ignoring 50% of damage taken until 1.5 million damage has been prevented.

Repeated uses of Ignore Pain accumulate, up to 4.7 million total damage prevented.

Swing in a wide arc, dealing 225,731 Physical damage to all enemies in front of you. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Your successful dodges and parries have a chance to make your next Revenge cost no Rage.

Demoralizes all enemies within 15 yards, reducing the damage they deal to you by 25% for 8 sec.

Generates 20 Rage.
Your auto-attacks deal an additional 107,281 Physical damage and have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Increases maximum health by 30% for 15 sec and instantly heals you for that amount.
Revenge deals 10% more damage, or 20% more damage when your successful dodges or parries have made it cost no Rage.
Devastate, Thunder Clap, Revenge, and Execute have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Using Shield Slam increases the damage of Shield Slam by 10% and the block value of your shield by 5% for 16 sec. Stacking up to 3 times.
Taunts all enemies within 10 yds to attack you for 6 sec.

Devastate deals 20% increased damage and generates 2 Rage.

Devastator deals 10% increased damage and generates 2 Rage.

Wounds the target, causing 88,892 Physical damage instantly and an additional 218,754 Bleed damage over 15 sec.

Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
10% of damage you deal adds to your active Ignore Pain.
Taunts all enemies within 14 yds to attack you for 6 sec, interrupts all spellcasting within 14 yds and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 6 sec.
Reduces all damage you take by 40% for 8 sec.
You are able to block spells for 30 sec.
Shield Slam generates 2 more Rage and extends the duration of Shield Block by 1.0 sec.
Shield Block lasts 2 sec longer.
Every 10 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Avatar and Shield Wall by 1 sec.
Shield Wall gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 60 sec.
Shield Slam deals 10% increased damage and reduces enemies' damage against you by 3% for 9 sec. Multiple punishments may overlap.
Increases Strength and Armor by 5% and your critical strike chance by 1%.
Increases Block chance by 24% and your Block value by 48%.
Increases Stamina and Armor by 8% and your Haste by 2%.

Charge to an enemy with your shield, dealing 1.1 million Physical damage to it and 359,819 Physical damage to all enemies within 10 yards.

Also stuns the primary target for 4 sec.

Generates 20 Rage.
Demoralizing Shout also generates 20 Rage and increases damage you deal to affected targets by 20%.
Your maximum health is increased by 6% and every 20 Rage you spend heals you for 1% of your maximum health.
Every 250 rage you spend triggers a Violent Outburst, causing your next Shield Slam or Thunder Clap to deal 200% increased damage, generate 50% more Rage and grant Ignore Pain.

Throws a whirling weapon at the target location that chases nearby enemies, inflicting 1.4 million Physical damage to all enemies over 9.0 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 10 Rage each time it deals damage.
Shield Charge deals 20% increased damage, grants you Shield Block, and makes your next Revenge cost no Rage.
Critical strike damage of your abilities is increased by 10% and the amount of damage blocked by your critical blocks is increased by 20%.

Colossal Might increases damage dealt by your next Demolish by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.

Shield Slam grants a stack of Colossal Might and Revenge grants a stack of Colossal Might when it strikes 3 or more targets.
Shockwave also knocks enemies into the air and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Shockwave, Revenge, and Whirlwind deal 3% more damage per target affected up to 5.
Colossal Might increases the damage of your Revenge by 7% per stack.
Damage prevented by each use of Ignore Pain is increased by 20%.

Shield Slam and Revenge damage increased by 10%.

Shield Slam generates an additional 3 Rage.
Shield Slam critical strikes grant an additional stack of Colossal Might.

You deal 5% more damage and take 5.0% less damage.

Size increased by 5%.

Colossal Might now stacks up to 10 times. If you would gain a stack of Colossal Might and are at max stacks, the cooldown of Demolish is reduced by 2 sec.

Enemies affected by Demolish take up to 20% more damage from you and deal up to 10% less damage to you for 10 sec based on the number of stacks of Colossal Might consumed by Demolish.

Generates 10 Rage each time it deals damage.
Shield Charge deals 20% increased damage, grants you Shield Block, and makes your next Revenge cost no Rage.

Stormstrike or Nature damage your abilities deal is increased by 5%. Stormstrike damage ignores Armor.

Thunder Clap damage increased by 40%. 

Seismic Reverberations now affects Thunder Clap in addition to Whirlwind.
Lightning Strikes also deal 69,187 to enemies near their target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Shield Slam damage increased by 15%.

Demoralizing Shout reduces damage enemies deal to you by an additional 5%.

Shield Slam and Bloodthirst have a 35% chance to grant you Thunder Blast, stacking up to 2 charges.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals 40% increased damage as Stormstrike and generates 8 Rage.
Intervening a target grants them a shield for 5 sec that absorbs magic damage equal to 3 times your Armor.

talent.name: Keep Your Feet on the Ground

spell.name: Keep Your Feet on the Ground

spell_tooltip.description:
Physical damage taken reduced by 2%.

Thunder Blast reduces damage you take by 8% for 5 sec.
Thunder Blast calls down a Lightning Strike on an enemy it hits.

Lightning Strikes generate 3 Rage.

Revenge and Execute damage increased by 25%.
Lightning Strikes have a 15% chance to make your next 2 Shield Slams have no cooldown.

Casting Avatar grants you 2 charges of Thunder Blast and resets the cooldown of Thunder Clap.

While Avatar is not active, Lightning Strikes have a 10% chance to grant you Avatar for 6 secs.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals Stormstrike damage.

An aggressive combat state that increases the damage of your auto-attacks by 15% and reduces the duration of Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects on you by 10%.

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 16% and all magic damage you take by an additional 6%. 

Lasts until canceled.
Movement speed increased by 5%.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 131,956 damage and healing you for 20% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 52,772 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards and resetting the remaining cooldown on Taunt.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 64,396 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec. Also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.0% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.
Raise your shield, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 25% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 66,525 damage and stunning all enemies within 16 yards for 2 sec.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Shockwave's range increased by 6 yards and when it strikes at least 3 targets its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Stamina increased by 10% and Armor increased by 10%.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
While dual wielding your damage is increased by 3% and movement speed is increased by 2%.
Critical strike chance increased by 2% and critical strike damage of Execute increased by 10%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Roar explosively, dealing 391,690 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 521,125 physical damage over 8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Thunderous Roar's cooldown reduced by 45 sec.
Increases the duration of Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect by 2.0 sec and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from all your bleeds.
While Avatar is active Rampage's Rage cost is reduced by 20 and Bloodthirst's cooldown is reduced by 1.5 sec.

Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 911,675 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Generates 8 Rage.

A mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 843,078 Physical damage.

Generates 12 Rage.
Enrage increases the damage your abilities deal by an additional 15% and Enrage's duration is increased by 1 sec.
Reduces damage taken by 30% and Bloodthirst restores an additional 20% health for 8 sec. Usable while stunned or incapacitated.
Execute no longer costs Rage and now generates 20 Rage.
Bloodthirst damage increased by 10%.
You take 10% reduced damage while Enrage is active.
While Enraged, Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage.
While Enraged, your auto-attacks can no longer miss.
Enrages you and unleashes a series of 4 brutal strikes for a total of 1.3 million Physical damage.
Raging Blow has 2 charges and has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Bloodthirst critical strikes generate 4 additional Rage and inflict a Gushing Wound that leeches 271,473 health over 6 sec.
Rampage increases your Haste by 2% for 12 sec, stacking up to 4 times. This effect is reset if you Rampage a different primary target.
Each Rampage strike has a 25% chance to refund a charge of Raging Blow.
Raging Blow causes every strike of your next Rampage to deal an additional 20% damage, stacking up to 5 times.

Whirlwind and Thunder Clap cause your next 2 single-target attacks to strike up to 4 additional targets for 55% damage.

Whirlwind generates 3 Rage, plus an additional 1 per target hit. Maximum 8 Rage.
Your Bleed effects deal 20% additional damage.
Go berserk, increasing all Rage generation by 100% and granting your abilities 20% increased critical strike chance for 12 sec.
Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage and while Enraged, Raging Blow has a 10% increased chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Whirlwind and Thunder Clap deal 25% more damage and affect your next 4 single-target attacks.
Mastery increased by 2% and if you are Enraged, Bloodthirst extends your Enrage by 1.0 sec.
Haste increased by 2% and Raging Blow and Bloodthirst generate an additional 2 Rage.
Critical Strike chance increased by 2% and Raging Blow's critical strikes deal 10% increased damage.

Become an unstoppable storm of destructive force, striking all nearby enemies for 2.8 million Physical damage over 4.5 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects, but can use defensive abilities and can avoid attacks.

Activating Recklessness generates 50 Rage and while Recklessness is active, Raging Blow and Bloodthirst are replaced by Crushing Blow and Bloodbath.

 Crushing Blow
Strike a mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 1 million Physical damage. 

Crushing Blow has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown and its critical strikes deal 20% additional damage.

Generates 12 Rage.

 Bloodbath
Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 1 million Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Bloodbath causes the target to bleed for 134,060 damage over 6 sec. Using Bloodbath on a target that is affected by Bloodbath extends the bleed by 6 sec.

Generates 8 Rage.

Unleashes your power, dealing 886,888 Physical damage and an additional 366,466 Physical damage over 4 sec to all enemies within 12 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Generates 15 Rage.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Bloodthirst at your target or random nearby enemy.

Every 3 Slayer's Strikes you gain Sudden Death.

Using Sudden Death accelerates your next Bladestorm, striking 1 additional time (max 3). Bladestorm's total duration is unchanged.
Each strike of Bladestorm applies Overwhelmed to all enemies affected, increasing damage you deal to them by 1% for 20 sec, max 10 stacks.

Charge increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Charge removes all movement impairing effects, this effect cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.
You heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sudden Death.
Your next Rampage after Bladestorm ends deals 50% additional damage.
When Raging Blow resets its own cooldown, your next Raging Blow deals 20% additional damage and 20% additional critical damage.
Marked for Execution increases the critical strike chance and critical strike damage of your next Execute on the target by 15%.
Bloodthirst has a 20% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for 826,807 damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Raging Blow damage increased by 30%.

When you Execute a target that you've Marked for Execution, you both reduce the cooldown of Bladestorm by 5 sec and apply 2 stacks of Overwhelmed to the target per stack of Marked for Execution consumed.

You can use Pummel and Storm Bolt while Bladestorming.

Revenge and Execute damage increased by 25%.
Lightning Strikes have a 15% chance to make your next 2 Shield Slams have no cooldown.

Casting Avatar grants you 2 charges of Thunder Blast and resets the cooldown of Thunder Clap.

While Avatar is not active, Lightning Strikes have a 10% chance to grant you Avatar for 6 secs.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals Stormstrike damage.
